entities.name: grimmald place
entities.description: The location mentioned in the text as 'NUMBER  TWELVE, GRIMMAULD PLACE'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, mentioned as hearing whispers and moving towards the front door.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: A member of Harry's group, mentioned as whispering to Harry and hoisting the Extendable Ear back up again.

entities.name: extendable ear
entities.description: An object used by Fred to listen in on conversations.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A member of Harry's group, mentioned as telling Harry that Snape never eats here.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A person mentioned by Ron as not eating at the location.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A member of Harry's group, mentioned as whispering to Harry and reminding him to keep his voice down in the hall.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person mentioned as being at the front door with Mrs. Weasley and Tonks.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person mentioned as lying flat on the floor after causing a crash.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: A person mentioned as being at the front door with Lupin and Tonks.

relationships.description: Harry is associated with Fred, as they are moving together towards the front door.
Ron and Snape are mentioned together in the same sentence.
Hermione is associated with Harry, as they are moving together towards the front door.
Lupin and Tonks are present together at the front door.
Mrs. Weasley is caused a crash with Tonks, as Tonks was lying flat on the floor after causing a crash.
